description: Validates the information about the time of the last table consistency check and falg those with age 30 or above

queries.name: q_table_consistency_check
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as NUM_TABLES FROM M_CS_TABLES WHERE last_consistency_check_time < ADD_DAYS(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -30)

actions.description: It has been over 30 days since several tables have been checked for consistency. To reduce the risk of data corruption, it is important to run consistency checks regularly during off-peak hours.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,2116157 - FAQ: SAP HANA Consistency Checks and Corruptions,https://me.sap.com/notes/2116157
